import React,{ useState, useEffect } from 'react' import {Link, useParams, useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' function Edit() { const [data, setData] = useState([]); const { id } = useParams(); useEffect(() => { axios .get(`/student/${id}`) .then((res) => { setData(res.data); }) .catch((err) => console.log(err)); }, [id]); const navigate = useNavigate(); function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); axios .post(`/update_student/${id}`, data[0]) .then((res) => { navigate("/"); console.log(res); }) .catch((err) => console.log(err)); } return (
Home
Key Data
Nama
setData({ ...data, name: e.target.value}) } />
E-mail
setData({...data, email: e.target.value}) } />
Age
setData({...data, age: e.target.value}) } />
Gender
setData({ ...data, gender: e.target.value }) } />
) } export default Edit
